Posts.Content: Aug 7, 2013 08:52AM Tumor_Hunter wrote: There is a Liquid Biopsy that is CLIA certified.  They do enumeration of CTCs at a more sensitive detection limit that CellSearch and they offer Molecular readouts.  Look up www.liquidbiopsy.com, offered by Cynvenio Biosystems.  This is something that needs to be ordered by your physician.
Posts.Title: CTC as a liquid biopsy meirav Tumor_Hunter
